mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (no, writer, content, reg, star, host_no, r_no, ref) VALUES (SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{content}, sysdate, #{star}, #{host_no}, #{r_no}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT v.writer as membername, v.content, v.reg, r.name as roomname, v.star, h.name as hostname, v.c_content, v.c_reg FROM review v, host h, room r WHERE v.host_no = #{no} AND v.r_no = r.no AND h.no = r.host_no ORDER BY v.reg DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE review set c_content = ${c_content}, c_reg = sysdate where no = ${no}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM review WHERE host_no = #{host_no}
SELECT avg(star) FROM review WHERE host_no = #{host_no}
